item.title: Shloader - A Modern Shell Loader
item.description: Why Features Preview Templating Usage Parsing Arguments Shell Configurations Trap Error and Exit Display Loader Call Loader Scrip Library Integration Conclusion Why I’ve been recently doing some old shell scripts to quickly automatize and distribute actions that were made manually, I’ll write a post on it later. For now I’d like to share with you how I’ve been coding a 100% shell loader library to use it in my scripts.
